Hajime no Ippo: The Fighting! 2 - Victorious Road

name: Hajime no Ippo: The Fighting! 2 - Victorious Road
summary: Victorious Road is the sequel to Victorious Boxers. Unlike its predecessor and successor, this installment did not see release outside of Japan.
